solution.text:
Volume = Difference in volumes between outer and inner cylinder
\(=\pi \times {r_ o}^2 \times h - \pi \times {r_ i}^2 \times h\)
\(=_{{pi_val*((j+2)**2)*k}}_ - _{{pi_val*(j**2)*k}}_\)
\(=_{{(pi_val*((j+2)**2)*k)-(pi_val*(j**2)*k)}}_\)

content.text: The unit in which the answer will be:
